request.subject: Missed Bin Collections
request.requestbody:
Dear FOI team
Please treat this as a request under the FOI act. 
Please can you tell me how much has the council spent on 
(a) general waste collection in 2016
(b) recycling waste collection in 2016 and 2017
Thank you 
Redacted

response.responsebody:
Dear Redacted
This is an automated response and acknowledgement.
Your request will be considered and you will receive the information requested within the statutory timescale of 20 working days as defined by the Freedom of Information Act 2000, subject to the information not being exempt or containing reference to a third party.

Dear Redacted
Thank you for your request for information, this has now been processed and the information that we hold is enclosed.
(a) The total cost for general waste collection in 2016 was £123,113
(b) 2016 - £90,218 and 2017 - £102,218

request.subject: Business Rates
request.requestbody:
Dear FOI team
Please treat this as a request under the FOI act. 
Please can you tell me:
(a) List all non-domestic properties and their addresses
(b) The date the rate payer became liable for the bill
Thank you 
Redacted

response.responsebody:
Dear Redacted
This is an automated response and acknowledgement.
Your request will be considered and you will receive the information requested within the statutory timescale of 20 working days as defined by the Freedom of Information Act 2000, subject to the information not being exempt or containing reference to a third party.

Dear Redacted
Further to your request for Information it is not possible to provide the information you requested as it is covered by an Absolute Exemption.
Section 21: Information already reasonably accessible.
We publish this information on our website. http://www.council.gov.uk
I apologise that your request cannot be met and should you have any further queries or information needs in the future then please contact me.
